message: Bought for my bf, arrived earlier than expected. Looks wonderful
Wir haben den Artikel in schwarz und blau bestellt. Beide super Qualität.

Die Handytaschen sind sehr hochwertig verarbeitet und passen gut. 
Der Versand hat etwas länger gedauert als gedacht, aber das lag vermutlich u.A. an den Feiertagen und weil bei der Paypal-Bezahlung aus Versehen die Packstation als Adresse übernommen wurde. Dahin konnte natürlich nicht zugestellt werden und die Anfrage über den Transporteur hat das ganze verzögert. Aber egal, das Ergebnis zählt und das ist sehr schön.

The product is great quality and beautiful. Unfortunately it does not stay connected to my wireless charger for fast charging. And sometimes it won't allow wireless charging at all. I think the material is too thick.
Love it! Excellent quality and service! Thank you!
the seller has zero communications.  I paid for the item but it was never shipped.  Seller does not communicate.  Never will do business with them
Beautiful craftsmanship!
Love the case. Nice and durable.
Nice case, fast shipping. Good experience.

Much darker in color than I was expecting (almost black vs the grey in the listing) but it's extremely well made. The stitching is perfect, the leather smells wonderful, and the seller was able to make a custom size for me.

Top quality product better than anticipated also soft luxurious leather and very stiff protective case with all holes necessary for charging and sound etc. Exactly placed, the magnets for removable case and wallet case clip are quality and very strong. The delivery was amazing from Europe to Australia in 5 days, wow. Totally recommend this business.
For the price it feels flimsy. The magnet holding the phone in place isn’t strong enough. Disappointing.

I love the design. The original I got had a bad snap. I notified the vendor, who immediately offered to replace it. I asked for the version with the flap (because the phone I have kept sliding out.) The replacement is fantastic: Snap works, and the flap holds the phone secure! I would purchase from this vendor again.
Bought it as a customized gift for my friend’s birthday. She said it’s such a unique gift & absolutely loves it! “One of my best gifts ever”! Great quality
Wanted to love it.  The quality was good and description accurate, but the watch face is too heavy for the band and always fell/slid to the side of my arm.

The case came in a beautiful little box in a little bouletta black bag with a little keychain. (Very nice, but ends up as a waste..) The case is exactly like what I saw on the pictures/advertisement! 
I hope this product is worth the money, only time will tell :)
Like butter.  Love it.
I love love this band!!!
Great cases I love them.
Perfect! Just what I was looking for. Fast shipping! :)
Quality is good. Wish the magnet was stronger. The phone does slip some and is not as secure as I would like. I have had similar cases that did hold the phone better.
I love my new case! It's such a beautiful colour and I'm really happy with the quality. It didn't take too long to get delivered to Australia too. Thankyou!

beautiful piece, exactly as pictured. Seller went the extra mile to get the wallet delivered on time.
Only concern is, the snap sometimes fails. Addressed this by making sure flap covers the snapped part.
I do love the watch strap but I wanted it all in silver and some parts  are a rose gold color.  Right by the watch face so it stands out.

Amazing quality! This is the second case I’ve ordered from Bouletta and I am SO impressed by the quality and how they continue to add improvements with their products. This case is high quality and I can already tell that it’ll last me a very long time! Super happy with it!
Schönes Armband aus weichem Leder. Die Schlaufen um das Ende des Armbandes zu befestigen, könnten angenäht werden. Dann rutscht auch nichts mehr raus. Aber sonst wirklich sehr schön.

Just as described!! Arrived VERY quickly!!  Seller was very helpful with the questions that I asked.  
Would buy from this seller again!!!

Pros: super fast shipping, quality product, excellent customer service. 
Cons: they sent the wrong item twice. They made good but it took a couple of weeks to get the product I purchased.
As expected and shipped fast!

I wasn't expecting this to ship from Turkey, but it still showed up in a couple days. Great service and a well made handsome product. I do wish they made one with 3 card slots though. Overall love it.
Superb quality. Had a customer service request which was addressed perfectly.  Thank you for your goods and service.
Love it! Excellent quality...We order again

If you have the Samsung S22 ultra, stay away from this case. The magnet that connects the phone to the wallet, causes the phone to think that the s-pen is out and will alert you. The case itself is so tight, that it caused my one week old screen protector to peel off. 

The seller claims that shipments leave New Jersey. When I tracked my package, it originally came from Turkey, I question if it was actually hand made. The seller was persistent with me giving them my phone number but never could give a reason why, only because the carrier needed it. Never have I given my number out in the past. When asked about a return address, I got an address in Texas. The only good thing was it was quick delivery.
Really fast shipping!! Exactly as described!
Beautiful case , top notch service
Schönes Armband zur neuen watch, schneller Versand.

Sehr gutes Produkt.
Es hat meine Erwartungen
übertroffen.
Love LOVE L❤️VE!!!
Exactly what I was looking for and great quality.
Fast shopping. Received as shown on photo.

I took one star away because of the unnecessary plastics included in the wrappings. I had a wallet by Bouletta for my previous iPhone and really liked it.  That one was with me for 3 years and it was still in perfect condition. This is why I returned to get another case for my new iPhone and I see the quality is superb just as before. However, I believe businesses should be responsible for avoiding plastics. With so many eco-friendly options nowadays, there is really no need to use plastic envelopes and wrappings. This was my only disappointed and next time I'll search for a business that does not utilize plastics.
very pretty. fast Mail out. Nice product. Would order again
It’s very nice quality soft leather.  iPhone 12 Pro fits nicely.  4 card slots. Would have liked a few more.

I loved my case so much that I bought one for my boyfriend. It was estimated to arrive in 3 weeks, but it actually took 2 DAYS! We are so happy with this purchase and the quality of the case. Thank you so much!
Nice orange watch band that is stylish and well made.  Considering that the band came from Turkey, it arrived promptly.  Thank you!
The wallet itself is beautiful and well made. The case is strong. It’s actually a little difficult to remove from my phone which makes me feel like my phone will be safe if I drop it!
I have not received the correct product yet.
Beyond my expectation ! One of my favorite purchase on Etsy. Great quality leather as well, very soft.
I love this watchband! I was looking for something that had this light green in it, and this was perfect. It's very well made and fits perfectly.
Can’t charge phone with the case on :(
When you have one card in the case the card is very loose but when both cards are in it can be hard to remove. All in all im happy with the look and dont mind overlooking this minor fault.

This leather is beautiful, high quality, great smelling all natural leather!  The delivery came from Ukraine, and from purchase to my mailbox was 13 days... Not bad!  The seller was very communicative and I highly recommend them!
Excellent product, well-packed, very quick shipping!
Very fast delivery. Item exactly as shown in the picture. I love it!
I love the color of this case!  The quality is great - overall very happy with this product.

My new waller with combined cell phone case has just arrived! I couldn't be more impressed! Phone case accommodates the s-pen very well and is made of super soft leather! My wife will be ordering herself one...now that she has seen mine!
Wonderful! Wonderful! Wonderful! The case is exceptional! The delivery was lightning fast! Top notch seller!!! Love this!!!
Great quality, fit the phone perfectly. As expected.

LOVE it. Exactly what I was looking for. Pretty, durable, keeps the cards snug. Magnet is strong and I thing the phone holder will also protect corners of the phone too. Will definitely buy another color.

Actually love it! I purchased thinking it was more of a case then a purse but found out it was a purse for my phone after it was engraved so I had to accept. 

But I am very pleased and think it is very well made. I plan to use it as it was intended for my phone after all. 

Thank you guys
Love this case!  Super fast shipping!
My third (for variety), great quality!
Fast shipping, great communication, and high quality. Just what I was looking for.

This was my 3rd attempt to find just the right wallet for my new iPhone 13 pro max.  I was feeling a bit like Goldilocks.  This one was finally just right! Love the color and texture.  And it’s very well made.  Very appreciative that the seller double checked the details to make sure I would get the phone wallet I wanted.
Beautiful and great quality! Highly recommended!

Great wallet! Holds cash well for your golf bets 🏌🏿‍♂️It’s secured with the zipper. I lost some credit cards with the magnetic  closure.Like the engraving it’s a nice touch and everything fits well. Finally got what I wanted in a wallet😎
Its a very nice Phone cover - The only thing is the phone wont stay in place, when I fold the cover to make the stand
The wallet is excellent; however, the phone case does not fit an iPhone 13. The case is too snug, and the charging port is inaccessible.
A cute little armband to make the Apple Watch look nicer.
The case holds a few credit cards and driver's license, and looks nice.
Prompt delivery and good communication with owner. Quality received did not disappoint and thank you for the free mask😊
The phone case is perfect, exactly as shown in the picture. It's a lovely blue colour, good quality, solid protection for my phone, and fits perfectly. It arrived really quickly too.
Really high quality overall. 100% worth the money.
I love this watch band but wish it was a little wider as I have the 44mm apple watch.  I will probably give it to my daughter since her watch is smaller.
Just what I wanted. Thanks.
Beautiful piece.  Exceeded my expectations in quality and material.  Glad I made the purchase.

This is a fabulous purchase! The seller reached out to make sure my selections were correct which was nice. I received the item quickly and I love it. I travel for work and I appreciate that I can slide my ID and a credit card in the slots and not have to carry a purse. It's great for the gym too.
Great phone case Quick delivery being that it was shipped from out of the country not NJ as it is stated on ETSY
Looks and feels great. Can still wireless charge with the base on.
Great quality leather, fits like a glove!

Beautiful case. Feels amazing. It will protect my phone very well. The magnet is super strong so you can stick your phone by itself to many surfaces without fear of it falling. I love my monogram lasered into the case. Very elegant. This case looks like it will be very durable for a long time. The blue is even prettier than the picture!
Excellent workmanship!!  Top notch leather and fits perfect in my iPhone 13 Max Pro!  The red is a warm Christmas red.  Would highly recommend this seller.  Shipping was very fast.
Bag is amazing. Great quality
very nice looking case and fits the iPhone 13 mini perfectly!
Love it. use it everyday!
Very nice leather band.  I wear it everyday just because it is easy to put on and very comfortable.  Would recommend this shop and item to a friend.

First of all, I really love this product. I only just received it today, but it is exactly what I expected and I love it. On the other hand, I specifically try to purchase items made in the USA. The description indicated made to order and that it ships worldwide from New Jersey. So I was disappointed when I found out it shipped from Istanbul, Turkey. That is my only complaint. I did appreciate the seller contacting me to verify I ordered for the correct phone model.
Beautiful case my wife loves it, Fast shipping, Thank you.
It’s nice, a few rough edges. Worth the price
Thankyou so much!
Very nice collar, love the color!

Its beautiful... know my husband will love it. Would be 5star except for tracking/ shipping issues. I contacted and they thought we would have had. Said would look into...I waited and nothing. So I asked for refund, they then said well it should be here any day. No one had responded to me that info had checked on.... It did finally show up. I was giving it another week as my husband really wanted. Quite happy with product.

I seller placed initials in multiple spots in the samples sent, until we were happy with placement. 

I had some issues with shipping AFTER seller sent item. It was no longer in the sellers possession but they still did everything possible to find the item and at one point even offered to remake it all together. 

Would recommend this seller and product 100%!

The case is really awesome. But it took way longer to ship than it should have. I also messaged the seller to see if I could send it back when it got here in order to trade/purchase a different one, because I smashed my phone the day the case arrived, lol. 
But, the seller never messaged back, and then they took this case off their store. So, I'll take it as big NO to working with me any. Pretty crappy customer service, I'd say. 
Also, their cases are way overpriced. I found the same cases and nearly identical ones on eBay for around 15 to 20 dollars. In the end of all this, I recommend buying cell phone cases somewhere else. 👎🏻

My new case is absolutely beautiful! Fast shipping 
Quality is superb and the fit is great! I’ve ordered other cases for my cell, and this is the only that fit my cell like a glove! Will def buy again!!
Beautifully made cell phone bag.
love it, tysm and god bless!!

This is my third order. I absolutely love this watchband. It makes my Apple Watch look amazing.
Highly recommend.
Great product. Exactly as shown. Quick shipping and very responsive seller.
The strap is as described. It is a little loose but still looks and feels great. Shipping was fast.
Never received the merchandise.  Had to request a refund
Excellent quality. One of the only slim credit card cases for Samsung phones I could find

I ordered a large desk blotter.  The vendor checked with me before he made it to confirm what I wanted.  I received it very quickly.  It is of good quality, iot protects the desk provides a surface my lap top does not slide over and a surface that I can write on.  I would recommend the blotter and company to anyone

I got Wowed with this beauty and that doesn't happen too often. Trying to find the perfect phone bag wallet for this old farmer is a chore but I took a walk on the wild side and got a woman's cross-body. Don't tell the other farmers. In the fields all summer and the woods all winter, I need the phone in a shoulder holster for a quick draw and this is it!
Love it. Wonderful quality. Highly recommend.

Le bracelet semble de bonne qualité. J'achète sur Etsy notamment pour pouvoir acheter d'artisans et pour choisir la provenance des produits. Sur la boutique, il est écrit que les bracelets sont faits à la main et il est précisé que la boutique est dans le New Jersey, aux États-Unis. Toutefois, le colis qui m'a été envoyé provenait pourtant de Turquie. La distance parcourue par le colis est donc beaucoup plus grande que ce que je souhaitais pour des raisons environnementales et les compensations carbones mises de l'avant par Etsy ne sont pas adaptées à la distance réelle parcourue par le colis.
Awesome product and merchant!! Fast shipping and ease of purchase. Thank you!
Don't bother, they don't send the correct size. I ordered an additional case from a different store,, for the same phone,  and had no issues.

This case is a deep, rich, purple leather. I love the color. Quality is exceptional. Seller reached out to me to verify I was purchasing the right size case. I appreciated her double checking with me. Very good purchasing experience.
I love it. It definitely matches the pictures and seems reliable. Will be returning for when I upgrade my phone.

Ich hatte versehentlich das falsche case gewählt. Brauchte S21 ultra hatte aber S20 ultra gekauft.
Eine kurze Information über die Kaufabwicklung ich bekam eine zügige Antwort und mir wurde das richtige zugesendet!
Qualität sieht super aus!
Vielen Dank noch mal für diesen Top-Service!! !!!!!!TOP!!!!!

Gerne kaufe ich wieder jederzeit bei ihnen ein!!
Grüße aus Berlin
Beautiful leather case!   High quality leather.   Looks great.   Shipping & tracking was difficult, but now that I have received the case, I am very satisfied with it!
I did not receive the item

High quality and appeared exactly as pictured.  The owner was exceptionally patient and accommodating as to where and how I wanted the engraving to appear. They sent a sample pic in a timely manner and without fail for each of my picky adjustment requests to ensure my complete satisfaction. I truly wish ALL sellers/owners would model themselves after this shop because without a doubt, the world would be a much happier place for all who shop! Outstanding.
Super qualité. Livraison rapide, contact bienveillant du vendeur pour confirmer ma commande. Parfait
I was very impressed with the customer service and the case met and exceeded my expectation. Very nicely made and fits perfect.

Now, to the case. I ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT! Best phone case I've EVER owned! PERIOD! I'm sorry I had to give shipping and customer service such bad marks, but they earned it...I'm not just being mean. Read the history and you'll get it.
It does fit my iPhone 13, but it’s very tight and difficult to get the phone back out.
I love how seamless it is to attach the wallet to my phone when I need it. Such a great quality and if I get a new phone, I'm getting another one of these cases for it!
Excellent product and excellent customer service!
Very high quality item! It fit perfectly. Very pleased with my order.
Fast shipping, quality product, and great customer service.
Totally happy with my purchase. Everything I expected and more.

This was my first purchase from this shop. The item is lovely and it exactly as expected. The seller promptly put it in the mail for shipment, and it was held up at the post office. I contacted the seller 10 days later and they were super apologetic and helpful. They worked with me and gave me plenty of options to make sure I was happy. Miraculously, USPS found and delivered my purchase and the seller remained kind, courteous, and very communicative. The watch band is lovely, but the seller MADE the experience and purchase 10,000 times more enjoyable. Would recommend this shop to anyone.

Love my wallet ! 
Fast shipping ! 
Very pleased highly recommended!
I ordered this for my brother he loved it thanks
Nicely made and very rich looking. Bought a cheap Chinese wallet 6 months ago that fell apart. Should have found this first.
A very beautiful phone folio cover , a very soft and great quality leather . Love it thanks 🙏

The case was exactly as it was presented and matched the description.  The quality is perfect.  It is a robust and good looking case.  The delivery was on time.  I appreciate the customer service from the seller.  Courteous, polite and on time as promised. Thank you
Very nice case and super quick shipping !!!  thanks so much  !!
Really love the case! 4 stars because it says New Jersey but came from Turkey. I was expecting hand made by someone in jersey.

It looks exceptional quality, i haven't used it yet but I love it.
Thanks a lot
lovely watch strap, but I wish it was at least an inch longer

Excellent quality leather, excellent quality workmanship, excellent customer service and the excellent comments I’ve received from people is always excellent. I will purchase again when an excellent opportunity arises.

The quality of this case is excellent and matched the description perfectly; in fact, it surpassed my expectations. It fits very well with my iPhone 13 Pro and the color is almost a match.
Delivery took longer than expected since it came from Turkey. I assumed when I purchased it the POS was New Jersey. There was a glitch with the local FedEx delivery person but it did  resolve itself. 
I would not hesitate to purchase another Bouletta case.
A beautiful desk pad.  Very comfortable and love the suede back on it. It is exactly what I hoped for.

Terrible communication, never received product.  Seller said it was on the way but tracking stated it was overseas.  Next seller told me the courier said it was delivered.  When I pushed back seller said courier made a mistake and it wasn’t delivered.  Refund issued.  Seller not recommended.

Correspondence with shop owner was excellent.  He made sure I was going to be pleased with the merchandise.  Shipping was longer but it is international so I expected it.  The craftsmanship of the case is better than I imagined.  Beautiful color and well made.  Thank you.
Love the design. Great quality.
The quality is this watch strap is excellent. The color and design are perfect. It totally transforms my watch.

I ordered this back in November, NEVER WAS SHIP as on Etsy stated Not Ship.  I email the seller last week about my order and he was checking on it.  Well I email the owner today ask about that was going on.  He wants to refund me my money all I want is what I ordered.
Item fit perfectly and the seller went above and beyond to make sure I had selected the right size and communicated with me the entire time. Great quality item as well!
Seller was quick with communication and made sure I had the design was what I expected before it shipped
A little too "snug" for all my credit & ID cards ... otherwise rating would be higher
Very POOR communication said it was shipped NEVER was! I did get my money back but how does that help when you are buying a gift!!!
Really beautifully made. Extremely good quality ,  I am very very pleased with this case. Thank you
Love it! I regularly receive compliments when I wear it.
Never got it, ordered it on October 11 claimed it was shipped no shipping information was ever available still nothing November 16.

I had some trouble getting this watch band at no fault to the seller, but the seller was so kind to me in helping me with the shipping issues and even sent me a new one when we lost track of the first one. The watch band itself is nice as well thank you!

Perfect…good quality and very functional.
Only suggestion for improvement is make it a little longer so cash doesn’t have to be folded.

I cancelled another phone case to purchase this one because it stated it was American made. delivery stated it would be delivered within reason also. I didn't receive a message from the seller until the day it was to be delivered. It was evident at that point the case was not coming from America, it was in Turkey. Case arrived yesterday and is already torn and the rubber sides is extremely poor quality to be a durable case. Overall very, very disappointed.
Amazing craftsmanship ! It’s absolutely perfect.
The quality is good and the watch band is exactly as described.
Love this watch band. This color is just what I wanted. It’s comfortable and fashionable. I will order other colors in the future.
Really happy with the product!
Watch band is beautiful!! Ordered with silver hardware and it looks beautiful with silver stainless steel watch.
Excellent quality, fit perfectly, and arrived quickly!
Case is great, beautiful and well made, only down side is with the quality leather used, it doesn't work on our wireless charging pad. Still love it though.

Hello. First time reviewer here. I purchased this case for my iphone 12 6.1 inches. A beautiful leather two slot case!!! Well made and NO stitches hanging out! Brilliant quality!!! Hope it will last me forever!!!
The product exceeds all expectations!
I love IT, WILL DEFINTELY ORDER AGAIN.

I love this case. it is super perfect...except I really wish the magnet that held the phone in place was alot stronger. the phone moves around all of the time and is not secure at all and it drives me crazy constantly putting it back in place. for as much money as this case cost you would think the magnet could be stronger enough to hold in place.  I have had previous cases like this, however not from this seller usually off Amazon and never had a problem with the magnet being weak. the phone should be connected to the case like it is actually "glued" together. not get out of place when you plug the charger in or turn the volume up. such a shame I really love the quality of this case and the color.
Very Pretty and comfortable watch band.   Shipping was quick - perfect.      Thank you!
Great product, the transaction was smooth the delivery was quick. Thank you so much for the GIFT! What a kind GESTURE!
Beautiful band! Exceeded my expectations. Thank you!
love this case! I didn't want any engraving or etching or badges/logos and got exactly what I asked for! wish I had one of these a long time ago
MY HUSBAND LOVES IT. GREAT!
I am enjoying the band. It is good quality and great color.
Picture showed leather more yellow green than the band is.  Very well made and looks like quality leather.  Shipping was fast.
Great communication, the wallet is well made and functions well.
Nicely made item in a beautiful color.
The second of two purchases - love these cases!

got an email from seller to confirm if I chose the appropriate case according to the phone I own
 I thought that was very nice of them. phone case is very nice. looks very sleek with monogram.
Love it! My desk pad is so soft and smooth. My mouse never skips and it feels nice on my skin.

Beautiful strap! Loved the look and quality of it but unfortunately with my small wrist size, it didn’t work for me (5.75” wrist for reference). Customer service was excellent though and provided a refund as they didn’t have a smaller size. Highly recommend this shop and wish it had fit!
Really love the braided band . It is beautiful!

Case showed up as expected. Seller went out of their way to contact me before hand, confirming my phone selection so that was a nice customer service detail I appreciated! Phone case also included a couple of custom masks in the box as well so thatnk you for that!! They're a little small for my face but the kids love em so :)
I love this band. Quick shipping as well!
Attractive soft band. Very comfortable.  Customer service spot on. Love that you can get all the metal to match your watch face.
Smooth transaction - shipped quickly, nice quality.  Very happy
Over all a good case. I wish it held more cards but I understand why that's not possible. Was a great experience.
Beautiful band & already worn multiple times!
Excellent customer service. Good communication.
Absolutely gorgeous wallet cover, I couldn't be happier. Super fast delivery. Thank you so much.

My case came today and it is exactly what I wanted.  My phone is protected.  The case is well made and the shop owner was beyond patient with me to make sure I got the correct size.  It meant more than they will ever know.  I'm a very happy customer.

Alles perfekt, sehr netter Kontakt mit dem Verkäufer. Super schneller Versand. Produkt entspricht der Abbildung.
Gerne wieder 🙂!
I love the quality and it met my expectations.
Great concept with the magnetic case inside the wallet option. Makes it easy to put in my car mount when traveling without sacrificing my wallet mobility.
Great to use to carry ID & cards since you can no longer take purses into venues.
Item was lost in shipment.  Reached out to seller and a replacement was expeditiously sent.  Great Value, with Excellent Customer Service.
As described. Beautiful case, fit perfectly!

I bought a case for iPhone12 pro but it doesn't fully go over the phone on the sides. I'm honestly worried that if I were to drop the phone at an angle it could cause considerable amount of damage to the device.
the item arrived on date that it was expected. the case fits perfectly and is high quality. the wallet part is also very nice
Amazing product, great communication, and fast shipping. Overall, 20/10.
Beautiful quality, lightning fast service. VERY HAPPY with my phone  case!

So I ordered a case for my phone. I ordered and received the wrong size case. The shop owners were under no obligation to make sure I got the right case but they did. These people have restored my faith in humanity. Not only did they reach out to be sure that what I got was correct but they sent me the right one and told me to keep the one that didn’t fit. To gift it to someone that needed it. Please support this small business. They are the real deal.
Oh, how I do love this phone case! Beautiful pink leather and snug fit. It is especially helpful to have little credit card pockets.
Beautify watch band that was easy to swap. Excellent customer service!
Nice quality! Looks just like the picture, Absolutely love it!
Just what I was looking for. Fits nicely and looks great.

I ordered this for my iPhone 8, I love it. the item is high quality leather. there is plenty of room for credit cards, cash, and change. keeping my phone in a zip around pouch keeps it safe from damage.buy this case!
I absolutely love this mat. I was surprised how shiny it is as the photos online make it look like it is a natural matte finish so I’m hoping the shine wears off. Other than that it is beautiful!
Great quality... Great Communication
Super friendly and fast shipping. I will be ordering again!
Very cute. The small was a little big and it’s loose on me but my wrists are very little.
It’s beautiful just what I wanted! Thank you!
Blitzlieferung und Superqualität. Einfach empfehlenswerter Verkäufer mit Top Ware!
Beautiful case, magnetic function is very useful
great produce although it is a bit expensive
a quality product as always, very promptly shipped, thank you!
Shipped quickly and nicely packaged, good quality, the seller was very helpful in making sure I had the correct size for both of the phone covers I ordered pre-shipping - thanks so much!
great and fast 3rd case I've purchased.
amazing delivery speed, fits perfectly, would order again.
The case exceeded my expectations. Very nice quality and it looks classy. Delivery was within 5 days from the order. Overall A+
Very nice quality and fast shipping. Looks very good!

Even tho I ordered the wrong case I was pleased with the sellers communication and even offered me a discount to order another case. Shipping was very fast. Disappointed that I ordered the wrong case but was still a nice looking case.
Amazing quality, lightening fast delivery. What more cold you want?
love this! comes exactly as advertised and great quality.
Product as described.Beautiful workmanship and great functionality.  Thanks
This case is great quality. Love it!
Item arrived in an elegant delivery. It seems that the item is from an excellent quality.
Ordered the blue color without realizing there were other color options and they were happy to change my order to my preferred color choice. Great case!
Great customer service and communication. Shipping was so fast and the leather desk pad is beautiful.
Amazing quality, and came so quickly!! Really appreciate them also contacting to check if the order was correct 🙂

love this case, I'm a wallet minimalist, literally, my drivers license and debit card.  this is perfect for you if you're like me, the less i carry the better!
The quality is amazing, perfect stitching, feels good in your hand.
Love this band. It is great quality and the delivery was quick
Love the leather.  Well made. Thanks!

Very beautiful case. Being able to take it out of the wallet is even more convenient than I’d have thought. The seller was proactive and helpful, double-checking my order before shipping to avoid potential headaches.

Only two drawbacks. One, the case is thick even out of the wallet. This is great for protection, but it won’t work with all wireless chargers. Two, I did get this bubble on the outside pretty soon after I got it. Leather meets water I suppose, but I think there are treatments that fix that. It may not have been as lovely and matte with it, though.

Overall very satisfied and will keep this case for a long time!
I love the color and the function of the case, but the magnet isn't strong enough that my phone falls out sometimes.

Just received the product. So far it seems excellent. Allows me plenty of room for cash and credit cards even loose change. The magnetic phone case allows a sense of security that the phone wont drop off when you open it. 
Granted I only have it for a brief time but I have owned similar wallet cases for my other I phones and you only have to grab it and go. No purse nothing else needed. 
If I have to recommend one thing to change it would be for the lowest credit card slot to have a window so a drivers license could be shown without having to remove it from the case. 
Otherwise it terrific.
Really beautiful watchband. I just love the color so much. The craftsmanship is amazing. I know this will last for a long time. Thank you!
Looks exactly like pictured. Fast shipping and good communication to confirm correct phone size etc. I have purchased previously and will continue without hesitation

A beautifully designed and superbly crafted wallet. The
leather is thick and beautiful--no scratches, marks,
changes in color, no blemishes. The stitching was perfect inside and out,  and the inside was well designed (many pockets, card slots, and a zippered pocket inside as well as around the outside.)  It feels
substantial when you pick it up and  I can tell it will be enjoyed by the recipient for many years to come. It sur-
passed my expectations in every way. Communication 
with seller was excellent and it arrived very quickly.
I wish I could give more stars to all involved. Thank  you!

The snap-on back case is nice and seems very protective. However, the star here is the zippered wallet pouch. It is beautiful! I love the look of the weathered leather. It feels and looks terrific. The zipper is smooth and appears to be of high quality. Plenty of room for my cards, cash and receipts. The Ultra size fits US notes unfolded in one of the 2 slip pockets. All I can say is I will be using this as my wallet from now on. Even if my future phone doesn't fit inside, this will be my wallet.

I purchased the Genuine Leather Samsung Galaxy Note 20 ULTRA (6.9") Magnetic Detachable RFID Protection Wallet Case with Card Slot, Note 20 ULTRA Back Cover.  I absolutely love it!  Even better...I received it faster than was told.   Great product and great service!

This is a terrific wallet pouch and case combo. I purchased the largest size for the S21 Ultra. I love everything about the wallet pouch. The leather is really nice. The zipper feels smooth and of high quality. My US notes fit in the inner pocket without having to fold them. There are 2 pockets inside. So I placed my vaccination card in the other pocket. Plenty of room for my cards and ID. Not having to fold my cash money really makes this full, really thin. And my phone fits in perfectly. The outer zippered pocket is also nice. I'm using this right now for my go to credit card. I recommend this wallet pouch combo without hesitation. I can see myself using this for years even with other phones as long as they fit inside. Great experience with BoulettaCase. I asked a lot of questions prior to purchasing this and they were great.

I received it today, brand new phone case, however I think the case isn’t a tight fit for iPhone 11 Pro, I’m a little worried for the phone to fall out the case however the bag will keep it secure just wished the phone had a tight fit :( am happy I can have all my valuables together tho :3
I love how it’s a magnet and the black leather such a beautiful vibe
Very happy with this purchase.  Great quality and color.
Gorgeous! Exceptional product and customer service! So Happy!

Hands down one of the best purchases I’ve made on Etsy. 

Quality exceeds expectations (Leather is soft, but not squishy.  Wallet holds 4 cards and they stay put without being too difficult to get out. Wallet still closes fine with all cards and cash In the hidden pocket!) Customer service was astounding (emailed within 3 days to make sure I ordered the right size of case, shipped the next day from Turkey!). Shipping was lightning fast (received within a week, ahead of time quoted). 

Fits my iPhone 12 Pro Max perfectly and the magnet removal case is the best thing ever. Xi charges absolutely fine on all four of my different types of wireless chargers (2018 and 2019 mophie, a Samsung, and a no name brand). Honestly I’m so impressed and have come back to purchase another for someone else.  The best wallet phone case I’ve seen yet
Fast shipping, great products! Thanks for checking on the right size too!
Fast shipping, great products! Thanks for checking on the right size too!
Fast shipping, great products! Thanks for checking on the right size too!
Love the design and stitching of the phone case/wallet. The card holder is a bit tight, but then again, that’s what you want in a wallet. Thank you!!
It is a very pretty case.   I love it.  My only negative would be that the leather is hard.  Softer leather would be nicer. But very nice case.
I just purchased my second flip case. The quality and the craftsmanship are just outstanding. Excellent customer service. Very fast shipping. Totally recommend!
I am very happy with the quality of the product and the look and feel.

Shipped quickly, though, via Amazon (same price).  Well made case. I like that the camera can be used even without removing the phone.  I don't expect to use the wallet function but rather, wanted a case with front and back covers, preferably leather, and this model had the least impact re: card slot placement.
The case is cute and sturdy. :)
I never received the item and have had no response from my attempts to contact the seller.
The item was received in just a few days and fits perfectly. Beautiful colour. Thank you very much.

The cover is fabulous - great quality leather. Also the seller was excellent at communicating a small delay in sending it out.  They also confirmed where I wanted the lettering & sent me a photo to show example.  The packaging was great too. Thank you!

Gorgeous! The quality, craftsmanship and design are outstanding.  My iPhone 12 glided into place and is secure in this very sturdy wallet. The shipping was fast, the packaging professional (slip cover for the wallet which was then placed into a thick box).  I am thrilled with every aspect of this order. Thank you very much!
I love it. Truly classic

This is a great quality item that has exceeded my expectations, the outer leather is very smooth and it has soft suede covering inside. Great customer service from Emre who really made the effort for me to get the case

Great communication 
Great seller 
Phone case is 5 stars

I am obsessed with this phone case!! It's perfect! It matches everything, it's so sturdy and so pretty! The shipping was so quick! This will be the only case i have a a long while and if i get a new phone i will just have to order a new case for that one to :)

I did not realize that I ordered a case for the wrong iPhone but they sent me an email to check. Thank goodness! It saved me the hassle of returning the wrong one. This case is well made and exactly what I wanted. It has places for my license and two cards plus a place I can put a few bills. The price is very reasonable.  I highly recommend them.
It is perfect! Thank you !
Phenomenal quality!
Beautiful colour and very well made.
It’s perfect! I love the leather and the convenience of having my license and credit card secured with the magnetic snaps on the back.
Never received due to shipment issues. Waiting for full refund.

This little wallet is perfect! I wanted something for a few cards, a little cash and my license.  It’s perfect and very well made. Thank you!!!
Beautifully made case.  A+ seller!  Quick shipping and great communication!  Thank you.

This product and purchasing experience exceeded my expectations. The seller reached out to confirm the phone model before finalizing the order, which I was very thankful and appreciative of. Thank you, BoulettaCase!
I love it! I just got it last night and literally spent an hour playing with it. The click is so satisfying and it is VERY sturdy! And it’s my size! Also it came so fast!
It made his phone a little less heavy and he loves it! He said is the best case ever.
The phone case is just as described and exactly as in picture. Perfect fit.
Excellent quality leather. Came quickly as well.
Love it! Beautiful.  Thank you
Looks great and is very durable. It was a gift for my boyfriend and he loves it! He's broken many leather wallet cases and this one has held up great against him.
Beautiful case...but did not fit my iPhone 12 even after I sent the dimensions.

Wow! Simply gorgeous! I’m so happy I’ve waited. Right after I placed the order the seller notified me that the blue case/wallet was out of stock and gave me the option to choose from other colors. Honestly I wanted this one in blue so I was ok waiting a few weeks.  I’m so glad I did, the box and packaging is gorgeous. The wallet itself is of stunning quality. The seller is very nice and answered promptly to any questions. Will buy again!
Bought this for my husband.  He loves it!
It gets better with age.  I love my case!

The leather craftsmanship is done well. I really like the case overall. However, if you like having monogrammed/engraved items as much as I do, DO NOT go with that option from this seller. The engraving done on my case is not what I expected. It’s not high quality. The font is not proper. It wasn’t even centered. I’m disappointed given how much I paid for the case.
I love it! Great quality!

The case is beautiful, however it does not charge wirelessly with my iPhone 12 Pro and Apple's new MagSafe Charger. BoulettaCase claimed that they had tested charging so I sent a video to the owner to demonstrate that the phone does not charge with the case installed.
Beautifully made!
Quality case. Arrived in good condition. No issues. Would use seller again .
The item that came was the wrong size even after I had double checked with the owner. It came late after Christmas and was a present for my husband. The whole thing was very disappointing.
Had great communication, good product
My case came in today. I love it. The magnet case holds my phone in place very well.
Love the case its perfect and received very quickly.
Fast delivery and awesome case cant ask for anything more!
Beautiful, stylish case. Fast international shipping. Thank you!

The phone case doesn’t allow my magnetic phone holder to hold it up. After two minutes of driving my phone falls off the holder. So I just take it off while In my holder. Other than that I like this case; I use the wallet more than the case.
Thank you for your fast shipping; and great quality too!

this is the second case i have ordered and i am even happier with this one. it is a different style than the first one and the detail and craftmanship are top notch. will not hesitate to buy again from BoulettaCase.
Love the case - looks great and love the quality

amazing this is my 2nd case (got a new phone) These cases are great and they really really last a long time, I was tired of buying cheap ones that fall apart in a few months. These ones do not, and you can get them engraved!
Excellent customer service and the case is wonderful. the phone magnetically attaches to the case for easy removal.

I recieved information that my product would ship on the 11th of December - it didn't. I wrote to them, multiple times, and got no response. It was not until I looked up the actual email-adress on their webpage that I got any sign of life back. Now they have cancelled my order (without having even tried to ship it to me), because they would not be able to send it in time for christmas - without me cancelling the order myself. (the only thing I emailed them is that "I would be disapointed if the package does not arrive in time for christmas", with is a normal reaction since it is a christmas present, but if it would have been late it would not have been a major issue. I have gotten my refund, but I would much rather get what I payed for in the first place.

An und für sich eine schöne Hülle, aber die 'Ummantelung', die die Naht versiegelt, ist nach nur drei Monaten an machen Stellen schon abgegangen. 
Und ich passe auf mein Handy wirklich sehr auf!
Das dürfte, vor allem nach so einer kurzen Zeit, nicht sein. Deshalb würde ich hier nicht mehr bestellen.
Dennoch Daumen hoch für einen freundlichen Kundenservice.
Great quality and fast service. very happy with this purchase.

I am happy with this case. The color is gorgeous. I did however want the leather to be a little softer. Overall it’s a very nice case. The communication from the seller was wonderful and prompt as well. I would recommend this shop.

Truly amazing phone cover. Exceeded my expectations in every way. The quality is just outstanding. I love how the magnetised phone comes out. An additional lovely touch was the velvet pouch the cover was in and the box, like what a really expensive piece of jewellery comes in. Will definitely order from Bouletta again.
This case is magnificent! The Sellers are a class act. Worth every penny. ❤
Very well made product. Shipping was fast.
doesn’t make phone bulky perfect fit.. I promise if your hesitant don’t be it’s worth every penny
Not well made!
Beautiful case. Very high quality, well worth the price.  Easily holds an extra card or two and some cash.  Excellent communication from the seller, and quick shipping.  Highly recommended.
Seller was extremely helpful; great communication, very prompt.  Case is stylish and well made.  Beautiful packaging features, but will personally request to skip next time to avoid waste.
Looks just like the picture. They reached out to confirm the order. It fits really well - no problems using charger, etc. The card slots are very tight so there's no chance of anything slipping out.

Overall nice. The case doesn’t fit quite as perfectly as I like though it is snug and covers 99.9% of the edge. I have no worries it’ll come off, just a millimeter of the top edges of the phone is visible where the sides of the case doesn’t come up and over. The magnet seems strong enough that the phone won’t come flying off when I open the wallet portion. However it does slide around it inside the space that it sits in if jostled slightly, making me nervous. When in the wallet portion, on the magnet, and lift to read the phone, it slides down and bumps into the zippered edge. I think the fact that the zipper closure creates an edge/lip around it also help me feel comfortable that it won’t come sliding out during use. I will probably not pursue a replacement because I love the style and haven’t seen an equivalent.
Erg blij mee. Ziet er mooi uit

The leather looks and feels great. It holds up pretty well too. I’ve had minimal scratches from use. The only down side was that the case portion is a little tight around my phone and make my cover glass pop up at times. I would definitely buy the case again.
Absolutely incredible! Case is gorgeous and well made. Top notch customer service! Highly recommend. Thank you so much!!
Such quick delivery and excellent customer service! Absolutely fantastic, wouldn’t hesitate to shop again
love the case.  looks just as good as the picture, if not better.  quick delivery also.
Great quality wallet and case.  Very pleased.

This case is perfect! I love how it separates. Definitely will order again. Thank you!❤
Perfect! Beautiful color. More than I expected. Fast delivery.

This case was a perfect gift for my mother, she wanted a phone case that could hold her cards but that wasn't a flip case. The colour is actually even nicer in person and the leather gives it a really beautiful, hand-made touch. My only comment is that there is no holes for the buttons on the side, like the volume control and on/off button. You have to adjust to pressing the buttons more firmly through the leather. But overall, a really nice, high-quality case.
Very fast delivery and lovely leather watch strap.

This product isn’t what I thought it would be. Leather quality is bad. The “Bouletta” logo is on the case twice. I wanted my name on the front of the case, not my name next to your logo....not happy one bit! Shipping was also another concern of mine, order was “shipped “31st but got to me on the 9th. I would like to return asap
IT'S BEEN ( 13 ) DAYS AND I HAVE NOT RECEIVED IT YET!!!!!

Seller shipped SO QUICKLY!  Only case I could find with a back pocket. It is so hard to shoot photos with those flip type wallet cases. This is extraordinary. The back can hold some money or a couple credit cards. This is also real genuine leather and nothing fake. Very well made.

Great item really good quality
Wonderful customer service and fast delivery
It is perfect 😊
even though I asked SPECIFICALLY that the item NOT be shipped USPS it was shipped USPS. 10 days later no case.
Great phone case.. Does NOT wirelessly charge (without wallet part of course) on all qi wireless chargers. I have to take my phone completely out to charge wirelessly.

It is a very nice case.  Loved the look of the leather.  However, it did not wirelessly charge with my Samsung charger.  Maybe it was just my specific circumstance, but I couldn't keep it since it didn't charge wirelessly.

Good quality. Feels great in hand and looks amazing. However, it would have been great if the top and bottom edge of the plastic case was little forward as it will give some height to screen when kept face down on surface.

It's a really good case! Top quality!
The profile said the business is in Sparta, NJ so I thought I was supporting an American Business, but... It's such good quality, I can't really complain!

Love it, looks even better than pics. Great quality, thanks.

Very well made however once you put a credit card in each slot and some folding money in the pocket it won’t close enough for the catch to engage. Also, my phone keeps telling me the magnet is a problem. I like it on the whole.
Very happy, love the phone cover, thanks so much A++++++
Very happy, great phone cover, thanks so much A++++++
this wallet is fabulous - holds a lot of cards!!!! Thank you

I expect delays but have received other household items, larger, more expensive items in far less time.  Maybe credit shipping costs as gesture of good will & customer service??
Just received this item and ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT!!!!!!
I bought this for my  and he loves it. The color is amazing.
Beyond perfect ♥️
Super fast delivery. Top service. Thank you for asking again if it is the right model.

Got this item as a Father’s Day gift to replace a similar case and this was absolutely perfect. It arrived quickly and is thin while protecting your phone. Price is a little spendy but the quality is great and looks like it should last for a long time.
Absolutely incredible craftsmanship. This will be a gift for my husband and I am certain he will love it.
Love this phone case!!!

Not only is a beautiful piece of work, it is exactly what I was looking for.  The fit for my phone is perfect.  I am confident in its ability to keep my phone protected.  I LOVE the fact that I can remove my phone from the wallet part so easily.  I LOVE this product!

Looks just like the pictures. The lip is high enough to cover the screen if you drop, but not enough to protect a tempered glass screen cover, in case you have one of those, like i do. Looks nice though, regardless. Note that the buttons don’t have cut-outs except the vibrate switch. The leather is soft in those parts there, though, So no issues; was just surprised i hadn’t noticed in the pictures.

I love the phone case.  It is beautifully crafted and my phone fits perfectly.   The magnets hold the phone nice and securely.  I can wirelessly charge my phone.  And it has 4 card slots plus a place to store $$$.  This was an awesome purchase!   And it arrived within 5 days of ordering.  Very pleased!
Wonderful quality, exactly what I was looking for!
Really really nice quality,  you can tell it was made and packaged with care.  Arrived rather quickly,  and it's beautiful!!

So glad that I finally decided to go with this case! I was searching for a case that would last and a new wallet. I decided to try this out since I've never had a wallet case like this before. I'm in love with it already! The color is as pictured and the case for the phone itself fits nice and snug. The wallet part is big enough to fit what I need but slim enough that it's not bulky and awkward. Plus, the option to personalize is great as is that it's genuine leather! I would definitely recommend this shop and would purchase from them again!

Item misrepresented as being from N.Y. and it is actually being sent from Turkey !  . Was supposed to arrive may 23rd, still has not arrived and it is May 31st. 
        May be niced when it finally gets here, but wanted to buy something from U.S. not another country .

I bought this phone case during the 2020 epidemic. It was delivered in 3 days from Turkey to Estonia. During the time when planes were not flying. 
The case itself is lovely, everything one would expect from it - nice quality leather, high level craftmanship, beautiful and stylish. It fits perfectly to my S20. Only good words about the product and definitely recommend the seller and the case.

But I feel terrible, though. For all the people that had to run during the epidemic only because I wanted a new case for my phone. I'd send it back if it wouldn't make even more people run...
Great quality! Loved it, very happy with purchase!
Awesome genuine leather case. You can even buff out little scratches.

Pros: Fast shipping, premium quality, good design, seller verifies your phone type
Cons: Wireless charging doesn't work, magnets add weight (minimal)

Details: The design concept behind this case is special, as it comes in two pieces: a base sleeve and a detachable wallet portion. The base sleeve fits tightly with precise cutouts (no room for sliding anything between the case and the phone). My biggest complaint is that the wireless charging does NOT work for me. (When aligned with the charging pad, the phone starts charging but disconnects after a minute, ultimately failing to charge. My guess is that the magnets within the sleeve are slightly mal-aligned.) If you're hoping to use the case with a magnetic mount, your mount will need to be fairly wide because the magnets in the sleeve are distributed along the edges.
Perfect for my new iPhone 2020 SE. all leather, like that the phone is easy to remove from the wallet. Closes securely with 3-4 cards with magnetic clasp.
I love my phone case, I got mine personalised and its exactly what I asked for! Its made for 2 cards but I can fit 3 in easy which is all I need for everyday. Thanks so much!
They sent me the wrong product and I need to know how to send it back so if you could email me at Jerry 686892.com or call me at 301-842-3497 thank you
Great product. Top quality leather arrived in 2 days and the seller was very responsive.

Great communication from buyer. Example pictures sent the next morning with engravings. Super fast delivery (I'm in uk) arrived 2.5 days after ordering beat the cheap one I bought on amazon as I thought delivery would be a lot longer! 
Its excellent quality and came in a great gift box.
Exactly the case I've been looking for and finally found. love it!
Phone case is slim and great quality! I thought it was coming from New York but it came from Turkey with 2day delivery! The owner even thanked me for my business ♥️
The quality does not look great for the price I paid and the engraving looks very cheap. Also had to pay $30 custom on this. I paid around $75 for this case - not worth at all.
Really great leather case! Love the natural pink
Beautiful phone case, very happy, thanks so much😊
This case feels very high end. The design, the texture it's all very good better than what I expected.
I love this phone case. It's beautiful and fits my phone perfectly. But I specifically wanted something made in the USA, but after I ordered it they said it was coming from Turkey.....
It's exactly what I was looking for and shipped super quick!
Beautiful! Great quality—color is very unique and looks high-dollar. I usually buy Apple brand but these are much nicer
Love my leather iPhone XR case! Also, they seem like really nice folks—I ordered two separately and they shipped them together to save me money ;-)

I ordered 8 different leather bands (over several weeks time) from various vendors (2 from Mister Crafter & Cosmexp) for my wife’s AppleWatch (RoseGold 40mm ver 5). They all arrived within a reasonable time, were all well packaged within a nice box (except Mister Crafter bands, which arrived in a small linen pouch), and have all seemed both comfortable, attractive and serviceable. I honestly haven’t noticed much difference with the retailers we chose(Bemfey, BoulettaCase, Cosmexp, MisterCrafter, NavelliLeather and VariantDesign) other than a slight preference for Cosmexp.
beautiful leather and well made case
The case is great! Feels like good quality and fits my phone beautifully. I also got a wallet to go with it??? I am very confused about that bit, but uh. It's cute. :)

Great. The magnetic attachment works very well, giving a secure cover in transit, but allowing me to carry a lighter version of the phone at home. The package arrived very quickly by tracked shipping.

The band is well made and attractive. 
Made in Turkey.
Nice cover and well made

Likes:

Dislike:

beautifully crafted wallet, was a gift to my best friend who wished for a minimalist wallet. this was perfect, small enough to fit in her pocket, and big enough to hold cards, cash and coins! thank you so much!

I had this item engraved on the magnetic clasp which is not a usual option and with the magnet below is hard to laser engrave however this seller managed it! And it looks fabulous.

This item is incredibly well made and amazing quality as you can see. Also having RFID protection is a great bonus.

I have tested wireless charging without the wallet section attached which also works perfect (many cases claim to be compatible but are not)

The case itself is a perfect fit to the phone. 

I had to communicate with the seller for the engraving etc and he was very pleasant and fast to reply.

I am a very happy customer. I cannot recommend this case and this seller enough! An absolutely perfect experience. Thank you very much

It’s looks extremely high end. 

There is also a personal message engraved in the inside.  
Perfect for an Anniversary gift.
Great gift to give. Loved it

First place I didn’t like it at all, when I received it doesn’t hold well the phone and all lines and scratches on the pouch.
That did very good respond after my unsatisfied reaction and send me replacement, so nice I like this product and there customer service they didn’t let me go and they make-shore to make me happy, thanks again.

Received our watch band it was perfect but taking off 1 star because there is some deception on where the item comes from. Their profile says located in New York and states it ships from New York but it is made and comes from Turkey. I was trying to support an American business but that was not the case. Just an FYI if you are wanting to do the same. If that doesn’t bother you, then this is a 5 star item.

Like: feels fantastic, premium.

Dislike: advertised as working with wireless charger, it does not work with a wireless charger.

Edit: Seller took over a month to get back to me about my issue, promised a refund, and now has not issued the refund forcing me to get back in contact. As of this moment, I seriously do not recommend purchasing from this Seller.

Very high quality custom leather case. If you have an iPhone 11 you already know how limited the accessories are from Apple. This is a classy and unique alternative to the three very basic iPhone 11 covers offered by Apple.
I love it SO MUCH! The quality is so nice. I will buy from them again for sure! I live in the U.S. and the shipping was so fast. I really am happy about my purchase!

I LOVE this wallet case. Like really really love it. It's simply perfect.  Highlights: the leather is soft and supple and the color gets more and more beautiful with use. The quality is beyond excellent. It's actually really quite slim, impressively so, and fits into all my back jean pockets without a problem. I love that the removable phone case itself is gorgeous and I can remove it from the wallet case when I'm home. All of my cards fit inside and I have no need for a wallet. Huge perk for me is that in the outside pocket I can keep a tissue, change, and best of all a spare key! I love that the cash fits unfolded in the pocket. The sellers were extremely kind and patient. I definitely definitely recommend this shop and its products. It's gorgeous, multifunctional on so many levels, slim design--what more could you ask for?
Beautiful craftsmanship and fast shipping. Thank you!
It is lovely, great quality and great service. Thank you very much. I am very happy with my new cover case.

This is a beautiful band. It exceeeded what I was expecting. I purchased it for a colleague and friend and simply can’t wait to give it to her. The packaging is beautiful (although environmentally I usually don’t like packaging - however, it will add to the experience of her opening the gift.  The internal envelope can be used long term to store the watch band, and the rest in her collection). Great service.
Excellent and responsive seller!  The case is very nice an the design is great.  Thank you!

I’m really picky about my cellphone cases. I’ve had this one for just over a month and absolutely love it! I’ve bought more expensive cases before but none of them have had this level of quality. Will definitely be buying from this company again.
Exactly what I ordered and very satisfied! The sellers communication about the engraving was great. Would buy from this seller again.
I get compliments almost everyday on this band--love it!
Excellent quality item but the charring left from the engraving process has stained the leather on the front. This will fade with age but spoils the look
Shipping was very quick, case is nice and has broken in very well! Thank you!
Most considerate seller ever. I got the product in a few days and it was amazing. Definitely recommend as the best leather phone case seller.
Absolutely Fabulous  .  .  .  Would Buy Again

This shop is amazing. Verified my order immediately.  It shipped quickly and they even emailed me to let me know FedEx was having a problem delivering my order. The case itself is beautiful and feels very durable. Very high quality. This is where I'm going to order my case from now on.

I’m the kind of person who sometimes just grabs the necessities and runs, so having a phone case that doubles as a wallet sounded perfect for me. I love this case! I had no idea there were separate pieces, but it comes with a leather & rubber phone case, that magnetically connects to the wallet book! When I just need my phone I can pop the wallet off, and still have a super cute case! Great design, great quality, totally recommend
quality work and great leather.
Great quality, fast shipping, magnet seems strong. So far extremely happy with my purchase
Love the color, fast shipping and fits my watch perfectly! I’ll definitely be ordering more!

Super fast delivery time (4days) (Belgium). 
I've just received it and that's the best packaging I've ever had. It really stand out and make you feel confident that you will receive a premium product.
The phone case is super great, soft, real leather and fits perfectly my Samsung Galaxy Note 8. 
I'm super happy of this product. 
The only issue I found is for the power/volume buttons. It's hard to push them but I think it will be easier with tje time.
Beautiful case, I absolutely love it. I did not expect how thoughtfully and attractively this case would be packaged, down to the last detail. Very happy with the purchase, good quality and value.
Beautiful and well made.  A bit tight, but will stretch a bit as time moves forward.  Fits perfectly in my tiny purse and is elegant looking.  Thank you!

I really like this case! It's very high quality and even lined with leather on the inside. It smells great too. I've had other leather cases that were much chintzier and fell apart quickly. I think this one will last a long time. Int'l shipping to the U.S. was very fast, too!

Love the leather. Very nice and unique. Love the case design and am glad I purchased it. Only one issue, the cut outs on the base for the lightning port and the speakers are not properly positioned and are too low for chargers to fit well through the case.

This wallet case is beautiful and the case itself really protects the phone. The only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars is the magnet. It doesn’t span the whole case, only the top and the bottom, so it’s much harder to stick it to my magnetic car mount. It works, I just can’t turn it to “landscape” without it falling off. 
However... The company’s customer service is amazing. They were really communicative when I asked questions prior to buying the case and when they shipped me the wrong size, they sent a replacement out within 24 hours. Very impressed. 
I recommend.

Fantastic phone wallet for my new iPhone! Quality and workmanship are top notch! I love that I can detach the phone from the wallet and still have it enveloped by a sturdy casing. And I’m happy to support a small business that does such great products. Thank you!

These cases I'm afraid will NOT WORK with a Samsung Note 9! The holes for the ports and S Pen are misplaced (I don't think this design makes it possible to do so without leaving too little material "above" the ports). Looks beautiful and feels amazing... Kinda makes me even more upset though, like the "quality checked" sticker on the packaging...
Beautiful product! The lining on the sides began to chip off almost immediately which was unfortunate, but the case as a whole is wonderful!
Thank you! Immediate shipping. I love the look and feel of the leather. I’m very happy with this purchase.
Great wallet and beautiful leather.

Pros: Outstanding leather that it is incredible in person. I've been looking for a leather case that wrapped around the entire phone and this case is a contender. An added bonus is the magnetic wallet which works well with the case. The wallet, case, and clasp has a strong magnet and it does not interfere with wireless charging.

Cons: As mentioned before in a previous review, the buttons, or lack thereof, are squishy. If you try hard enough, you can feel the outline of the power button and volume rocker. At times with the wallet case attached, it was difficult turning off my phone leading me to remove my phone completely out of the case to turn off. The cutouts for the silent switch and speakers are either grossly large or too small. This case was not designed for the iPhone XS as the speakers on the left side were covered.
Just what I was looking for. Fast shipping as well.
I love the wallet case I ordered from you!!!!

Super nice leather that smells like leather. Very well constructed. The only negative is the leather is thick such that the phone’s volume and home buttons have to be mashed pretty hard to function. Despite the one shortcoming, this case is superb.
